name: AOS Manager
description:
Aos Manager is Esports(AOS,MOBA) Manager Simulator.
Team up to win the tournament and use various tactics.
Plan a PickBan according to the abilities of the players.
It's not complicated, it's a game that's faithful to the basics.

● Player scout
Bring in players and complete a strong team.
(Other Teams Players, F/A Players)

●Tactical Setting
Coordinate the tactics of the team and the players.

●Pick/Ban System
Pick/ban 38 heroes according to tactics.
